title: God Kings, Wardens and Marauders
body:
I just had a thought that was really interesting...
The Wardens (eg Warden Karma, Warden Jax, etc) have smililar beliefs to God King Garen, that the law is the law and should always be followed, no expetions. Also on the other hand the Marauders (eg Maraduer Ashe, Maraduer Warwick, etc) have similar beliefs to God King Darius that they want to burn things.
This got me thinking...could the Wardens and Marauders be working with/alongside their respective Kings? It makes sense how GKG is kind of a tyrant and the wardens will be the law and see that his wishes are followed through, and the Marauders would be GKD’s assassins, killing people and making distractions.
I’m not sure if this has already been said though or confirmed.

replies.body: Those skinlines are in a different universe, though I love your theory.

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PEgb9Uu7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-12T23:41:43.638+0000)
>
> Those skinlines are in a different universe, though I love your theory.

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

We need more of those.

I'm still waiting for Warden Taric.
Yeah, Jax has a God Skin and a Warden Skin, so it won't work :(
